quotes.quote: An excellent photograph is the one which has excellently captured an excellent moment!
Photography is the only language that can be understood anywhere in the world.
A picture is worth a thousand words.
A good snapshot keeps a moment from running away.

To take a picture is to have an interest in things as they are, in the status quo remaining unchanged, to be in complicity with whatever makes a subject interesting, worth photographing including, when that is the interest, another person's pain or misfortune.
Capture every moments of your life.
It is easy to take a photograph, but it is harder to make a masterpiece in photography than in any other art medium.
Photography is an adventure just as life is an adventure.
In a photo shoot, you have to be very comfortable in your own skin. It's all about confidence-boosting and putting on armor.
Photography is the simplest thing in the world, but it is incredibly complicated to make it really work.
Photography takes an instant out of time, altering life by holding it still.
It is more important to click with people than to click the shutter.
Photography is an act of love.
A good photograph is knowing where to stand.
Most photo shoots are a beautiful dress, a natural location, and poses.
A perfectly clear photograph is a distortion of reality.
Photography captures a moment in time. Art captures time in a moment.
Photography is a very forgiving medium. Anybody that can afford film and a camera can make pictures.
A good photograph is one that communicates a fact, touches the heart and leaves the viewer a changed person for having seen it. It is, in a word, effective.
Photo shoots for underage girls are like letting an ant walk around with honey.
Photography is the easiest thing to make, and one of the hardest things to make well.
Photography's beauty is to find beauty even in ugly situations.
The best thing about a picture is that it never changes, even when the people in it do.
Photography is all about secrets. The secrets we all have and will never tell.
Photographing a culture in the here and now often means photographing the intersection of the present with the past.
Photography was the first available demonstration that light could indeed exert an action sufficient to cause changes in material bodies.
Photography is an art which touches and grips one's own heart's blood.

Photography is the easiest medium with which to be merely competent. Almost anybody can be competent. It's the hardest medium in which to have some sort of personal vision and to have a signature style.
It's true that a picture is worth a thousand words, but it's also true that a word is worth a thousand pictures.
Taking pictures is savoring life intensely, every hundredth of a second.
